headline: Pentair downgraded at Barclays on fading margin gains
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays downgraded Pentair to Equal Weight from Overweight and cut its price target to $115 from $127, saying the company’s multi year margin expansion is unlikely to repeat as transformation benefits taper and earnings growth becomes more dependent on end markets.

content.title: Pentair downgraded at Barclays on fading margin gains
content.summary: Investing.com -- Barclays downgraded Pentair to Equal Weight from Overweight and cut its price target to $115 from $127, saying the company’s multi year margin expansion is unlikely to repeat as transformation benefits taper and earnings growth becomes more dependent on end markets.
